post.content:
There is a snazzy Monster Hunter Rise Nintendo Switch console bundle coming alongside the game on 26th March.

Big beastie Magnamalo is printed in gold on the console dock, while assorted Monster Hunter desGaming Origins feature on its rear aspect, as effectively as on every Joy-Con. The console box also contains download codes for a copy of Monster Hunter Rise, its bonus voice material and its Deluxe Kit DLC.
